content.text: Welcome to a 'bruin café', a traditional Dutch pub. In this lesson, you'll learn how to secure a table, order drinks and snacks, and handle a common dietary question.

data.meaning: What kind of draft beer do you have?

data.tip: The 'ui' sound is unique to Dutch. It's like a quick glide from 'ah' to 'ee'. Think of the sound in the English word 'boy', but with your lips more rounded.

content.title: Securing the Table & Ordering
content.setting: You enter a cozy, traditional Dutch pub. You see a bartender behind the bar and an empty table near the window.

conversation_flow.title: Greet the bartender and ask if the table by the window is free.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goeiemiddag! Welkom. Wat kan ik voor u doen?

conversation_flow.title: Tell the bartender you are waiting for a friend who is five minutes late.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Jazeker, die tafel is vrij. Ga gerust zitten. Verwacht u iemand?

conversation_flow.title: Order a 'fluitje' for yourself to start.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Geen probleem. Kan ik alvast iets te drinken voor u brengen?

conversation_flow.title: Ask what kind of draft beers they have.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Een fluitje, komt eraan. We hebben ook speciaalbier van de tap.

conversation_flow.title: Acknowledge the options and ask to see the menu for snacks ('borrelhapjes').
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: We hebben Heineken, Brand en een lokaal blondbier. Hier is uw fluitje alvast.

content.text: Great start! Now you need to order some snacks. 'Bitterballen' are very popular, but it's always good to check ingredients for dietary needs.

data.meaning: Excuse me, may I order something?
About how long does that take?

content.title: The Snack Complication
content.setting: You have the snack menu. The waiter is clearing a nearby table.

conversation_flow.title: Get the waiter's attention and order a portion of bitterballen.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Natuurlijk, hier is de kaart voor de borrelhapjes. Ik kom zo bij u terug. ... Ja, zegt u het maar!

conversation_flow.title: Quickly ask if there is meat in the bitterballen, as your friend is vegetarian.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Een portie bitterballen, goede keuze. Dat noteer ik.

conversation_flow.title: React with relief and change your order to 'kaassoufflés' instead.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, in bitterballen zit rundvlees. Goed dat u het vraagt!

conversation_flow.title: Ask for extra mustard on the side.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Prima, dan maak ik er kaassoufflés van. Wilt u daar saus bij?

conversation_flow.title: Ask approximately how long the snacks will take to prepare.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Natuurlijk, extra mosterd apart. Komt in orde.

content.text: Well done handling that mix-up! Now it's time to pay. In the Netherlands, 'pinnen' (paying with a debit card) is very common.

data.meaning: I would like to pay by card.

data.phrase: Kunt u er ... fooi bij doen?

content.title: Settling Up
content.setting: You've finished your drink and snacks. Your friend still hasn't arrived, so you decide to leave. You need to get the waiter's attention to pay.

conversation_flow.title: Get the waiter's attention and say you would like to pay by card.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Het duurt ongeveer tien minuutjes. ... Zo, hier zijn de kaassoufflés. Eet smakelijk! ... Is alles naar wens?

conversation_flow.title: The waiter thinks you are paying with the next table. Clarify you only want to pay for your table.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Jazeker. Ik kom er zo aan met het pinapparaat. Dat was voor tafel 7 en 8 samen, toch?

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you can add a 10% tip to the card payment.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oh, mijn excuses! Alleen uw tafel, natuurlijk. Dat is dan één fluitje en de kaassoufflés. Het bedrag is €12,50.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm that the total amount on the screen is correct before you pay.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dat is heel vriendelijk, dank u wel. Ik voeg het toe. Het totaal is nu €13,75. Hier is het apparaat.
conversation_flow.final_message: Prima, de betaling is gelukt. Hartelijk dank en een fijne dag nog!
